subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Sophomore safety Demetrice Morley’s jump in grade point average put him at the center of the scandal surrounding University High School, a correspondence school in Miami that was found to be a diploma mill.
snippet: Sophomore safety Demetrice Morley’s jump in grade point average put him at the center of the scandal surrounding University High School, a correspondence school in Miami that was found to be a diploma mill.
